title: Apple Stock Prediction - Feature-Engineered Financial Dataset
subtitle: Comprehensive AAPL dataset with 80+ features: technical indicators, competitors, macro, social trends
description:
# Apple Financial and Social Analysis Dataset

## Overview
Comprehensive financial dataset for Apple Inc. (AAPL) stock analysis with 80+ engineered features spanning technical indicators, competitor data, macroeconomic variables, and social sentiment.

## Key Features
- **2,696 daily samples** from 2015-03-13 to 2025-11-28
- **80 feature columns** including:
  - Technical indicators (RSI, MACD, Bollinger Bands, ATR)
  - Competitor stocks (AMZN, MSFT, GOOGL, META)
  - Macroeconomic data (Fed rate, CPI, USD index, treasuries)
  - Social/search trends (Google Trends for Apple products)
  - Lagged returns and momentum features

## Model Performance
- **RMSE**: 1.93% (walk-forward validation)
- **Ensemble Sharpe**: 1.10 (LightGBM + XGBoost)
- **RÂ²**: -0.30 (challenging prediction task)

## Contents
- `data/apple_feature_enhanced.csv` - Main dataset
- `reports/` - Analysis results (PDF, CSV)
- `figures/` - Visualization plots
- `docs/` - Feature descriptions and README

## Use Cases
- Stock price prediction and trading strategies
- Time series forecasting with multiple data sources
- Feature engineering and selection studies
- Ensemble modeling and walk-forward validation
- SHAP explainability analysis

## Citation
If you use this dataset, please cite:
```
Apple Financial and Social Analysis Dataset (2025)
Kaggle Dataset
```
